nvcc   -D_ENABLE_CUDA_  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/circustent.dir/CT_Main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/circustent.dir/CTOpts.cpp.o Impl/CT_CUDA/CMakeFiles/CT_CUDA_OBJS.dir/CT_CUDA.cu.o Impl/CT_CUDA/CMakeFiles/CT_CUDA_OBJS.dir/CT_CUDA_IMPL.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/circustent.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib
